msg: - use platform package instead of db.props when loading the db model from xml

author: mpoeschl
msg: this packages replaces the db.props files and will be used to generate the sql in the near future

author: henning
msg: Add a new property "objectIsCaching" that controls whether or not the created
object classes cache their foreign key relations or not. This is necessary if
the application considers torque to be "just a java object mapper" and not a
more complex tool that also keeps internal relationships.
Default is that the object cache their informations, which is the same as the
